com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny
Class Clock

java.lang.Object
  ej.mwt.Widget
      com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny.Clock
All Implemented Interfaces:
IClock, IDate, ITime, IWidget, ej.mwt.Renderable
public class Clock
extends ej.mwt.Widget
implements IClock

A clock is a widget that displays a date.

          NOT IN API

          Creates a new clock with the current time.

          Creates a new clock specifying the date.
A clock is disabled by default.

Constructor Detail

Clock

public Clock()
Creates a new clock with the current time.
Equivalent to Clock(Date) passing new Date(System.currentTimeMillis()) as argument.

Clock

public Clock(java.util.Date date)
Creates a new clock specifying the date.
A clock is disabled by default.

Parameters:
date - the date of the clock
Method Detail

setDate

public void setDate(java.util.Date date)
Sets a new date. The clock is not automatically repainted.
